attributes.title: Need to know
attributes.review: This app is talking about what trump wants to do with the USA. But have you ever thought of the fact that most of it is taking about one of our amendments. They see something that COULD be a problem, but isnâ€™t and says letâ€™s take that away. Which takes away our freedom to express ourselves in different ways through different apps. I do not agree with this at all. Gen Z 2020

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review:
Okay, so I got this app because I wanted to support our president but the app kept crashing and kicking me off.
I have no idea why but it was just horrible. Every time I clicked on the app, it would crash over and over and over again. Apple store needs to fix this or at least get rid of this app because of its poor features and functions. Okay? Okay. Thank you.

attributes.title: Kept glitching had really high hopes

Probably have to go get a new phone right after I write this review cos the app messed up the whole system on my phone and raided my whole house. DO NOT GET THIS APP.

attributes.title: THE WORST
attributes.review: Phone always crashes. I donâ€™t support trump in anyway, with all his racist comments about black. How can you say â€œLetâ€™s make America great againâ€ when itâ€™s never even been great from the start. I do not recommend this app to anyone. I wish there was a -â­ï¸ button because this thing doesnâ€™t even deserve 1 star. It should get 0, matter of fact it should be deleted. Again HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS OFFICIAL DONALD TRUMP 2020 APP!!!!!!!

attributes.title: TRASH APP
attributes.review: This app took hours to download, and then was very glitchy after finally completing download. I can barely navigate the app. I wanted this app so I could continue to faithfully follow our president and be a better citizen of the greatest country in the history of the world but I am FRUSTRATED! This app is not what it promised! Fake App! Probably developed by some dumb do-nothing democrats! They are destroying this country and now these apps! Apple, I URGE YOU, PLEASE DELETE THIS APP!!!!!
